rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Welcoming space with minimalistic Scandinavian design featuring a sleek wooden reception area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living room adjoining the kitchen, characterized by natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows and a clean Scandinavian aesthetic.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional Scandinavian kitchen with integrated storage and energy-efficient appliances.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment zone with soundproofing features, ambient lighting and a view-enhancing window design.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Secure and modern entrance with Scandinavian design elements.

openings.name: Sliding Glass Door
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling glass door offering seamless indoor-outdoor connection.

openings.name: Window
openings.location: north facing wall, living room and home theater
openings.description: Large floor-to-ceiling windows providing abundant natural light and scenic views.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with ample natural lighting and integrated Scandinavian furnishing, ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed for children or guests with a balanced Scandinavian aesthetic.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring adherence to Vastu guidelines and offering ample natural light.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom with Scandinavian design elements, functional storage, and efficient water fixtures.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Private balcony offering a space for relaxation and natural light.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.location: Between ground floor and first floor
openings.description: Sturdy, elegantly designed staircase with minimalist detailing.
